Question
========
What does the command `quarto check` do?

Answerlist
----------
* Renders the current document to HTML
* Lists system tools Quarto can use and whether they are available
* Creates a new Quarto project
* Opens the Quarto website in a browser

Solution
========
`quarto check` reports on external tools Quarto can integrate with on your system.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
